backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing authorization, user profiles, bookings, and reviews with admin-protected queries and mutable booking state.
feature_evidence.json: Defines feature evidence metadata linking a layout-banner removal change to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains pre-generated descriptions of multiple frontend files for documentation or build analysis.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and CSS variables defining the appâ€™s OKLCH color theme with light/dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file loading fonts, metadata, and mounting the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures the TanStack Router, shared layout (Header/Footer), routes, error screens, and theme provider.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminGate.t: Authorization wrapper that checks Internet Identity authentication and admin role before rendering protected content.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with reactive UI based on authentication state.
frontend/src/components/branding/Logo.ts: Logo component rendering the shop logo with a styled fallback if the image fails to load.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer component showing shop info, quick navigation links, contact details, and attribution.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Header with logo, navigation links, phone button, and responsive mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/layout/TopBanner: Empty file placeholder for a top banner component.
frontend/src/components/system/AppErrorB: React error boundary that catches app errors and displays an error screen.
frontend/src/components/system/AppErrorS: UI component displaying an error message, optional details, and a reload button.
frontend/src/constants/shopInfo.ts: Static shop information including name, phone numbers, and address.
frontend/src/data/galleryItems.tsx: Gallery data list describing repair services with images, icons, and details.
frontend/src/data/servicesCatalog.tsx: Catalog of service categories and individual services with descriptions and metadata.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuth.ts: Hook to check if the current caller is an admin using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useBookings.ts: Hooks for fetching, creating, and updating bookings for both admin and public access.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, exposing identity, login, logout, and status helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/usePayments.ts: Defines a React Query hook that fetches all payment instructions from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useReviews.ts: Contains hooks to fetch sorted reviews and submit new reviews, using React Query for caching and mutations.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables and utilities including iOS-safe area and dynamic viewport height support.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AdminBookingsPage.tsx: Admin interface for viewing bookings, handling loading/error states, and updating booking statuses through a modal flow.
frontend/src/pages/BookingPage.tsx: Customer booking form that validates inputs, converts date/time to nanoseconds, submits a booking, and shows a success screen.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Displays contact info, location, and business hours using shop constants and UI components.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Displays a grid of gallery items with images and badges, and opens a dialog showing item details when selected.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentsPage.tsx: Shows available payment methods and loads dynamic payment instructions with loading and display states.
frontend/src/pages/PublicBookingsPage.ts: Lists public bookings with status indicators, loading/error states, and a dialog for booking details.
frontend/src/pages/ReviewsPage.tsx: Displays customer reviews and includes a form for submitting new reviews with validation and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Shows a categorized services catalog using accordions and includes a CTA to book a repair.
frontend/src/pages/ShopPage.tsx: React page rendering a shop hero section, contact bar, and main content with shop info using UI components and SHOP_INFO data.
frontend/src/utils/time.ts: Provides Safari-safe utilities for formatting dates and converting date/time strings to nanosecond timestamps.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters with hash-routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, custom colors, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing state, features, and pending requests for the Rconnect project.
